name: Pindestino
tagline: Pindestino is a node.js kiosk mode Raspberry Pi distribution
body:
### Features

* Pindestino will boot from a read-only SD card.
* At boot, it will run your node.js web app from an USB.
* When your node.js server has started and listens on port 80 on localhost, Pindestino will start a web browser in full screen kiosk mode and point it to your web app.

### Audience

This distribution was first made for running information screens at the Royal Dramatic Theatre in Stockholm.

It can be used for information screens, adscreens, kiosk computers, etc.

### Get it

Clone or download the [build scripts at GitHub](https://github.com/klandestino/pindestino).

### Contribute!

Don't hesitate to fork and contribute! The build scripts are GPLv3 and we <3 community code!

Please, file your bug reports, issues, feature requests etc. at [GitHub](https://github.com/klandestino/pindestino).

Pindestino is maintained by Alfred Godoy <alfred@klandestino.se> at [Klandestino AB](http://klandestino.se).
